summary:
This mod is gonna be a armor set that is in another mod im working on that will be released in the future. This is just the standalone retexture for the nightingale armor and the hood fix (No Eye Cover)is included.

Still a work in progress to my other mod im making this for.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Contact Me:
[Twitter] (I will post my status on mod updates and upcoming mods here so follow me on twitter)
[url=https://twitter.com/DarkWolfModding]DarkWolfModding[/url]
[/size][size=5][url=http://darkwolfmodding.wix.com/darkwolfmodding]Check out my website[/url]
Still a work in progress to my other mod im making this for.
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/38997-2-1374987784.png[/img]
[color=orange][Description][/color]
This mod is gonna be a armor set that is in another mod im working on that will be released in the future. This is just the standalone retexture for the nightingale armor and the hood fix (No Eye Cover) is included.

[color=orange][Installation][/color]
Drag and drop the "Nightingale Assassin Retext.bsa" and the "Nightingale Assassin Retext.esp" into your skyrim data directory.

For 64Bit:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data

For 32Bit:
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data

[color=orange][Uninstallation][/color]
Remove the "Nightingale Assassin Retext.bsa" and the "Nightingale Assassin Retext.esp" from your skyrim data directory.

For 64Bit:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data

For 32Bit:
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data

[color=orange][Limitations][/color]
- Male Only Retexture (for now)

[color=orange][Mod Status][/color]
Female torso retexture in progress. (May be released here as well as with the mod im working on.)
[/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
